TextView.android:text: I felt at ease talkign to strangers
Took chance to meet new people
Anxious about being foolish in front of people
I was dwelling on mistakes I made in my social interactions
I kept thinking about negative social interactions
I was worrying about how my social interactions would turn out
I kept thinking about bad things that could happen during social interactions
Tried to come up with a plan to solve the problem
Waited to see if the situation fixed itself
Identified something good in what had happened
Told myself to learn to live with the situation
Got upset and vented my emotions
Pretended that the situation did not happen
Tried to distract myself by thinking about or doing other things
Took alcohol/drugs to stop myself from thinking about it.
If never, to whom did you express these feelings?
Health/Wellbeing of a family member or significant other
When thinking about your potential social interactions tomorrow...:
On average, to what extent do you expect you will interact effectively with others in these social situations?
On average, to what extent do you expect to enjoy/dislike these social interactions?
